48K.SG.summary: Kofola CeskoSlovensko a.s., together with its subsidiaries, produces and distributes non-alcoholic beverages in the Czech Republic, Slovakia, Poland, Slovenia, Croatia, and internationally. It provides carbonated and non-carbonated beverages, water, syrups, jams, energy drinks, fresh juices, fresh/salad bars, herbal teas, and coffee bean mixtures. The company offers its products primarily under the Kofola, Vinea, Radenska, Studenac, Rajec, KlÃ¡ÂtornÃ¡ Kalcia, JupÃ­, JupÃ­k, Semtex, UGO, LEROS, and CafÃ© Reserva brand names, as well as under private labels for third parties, such as retail chains. It is also involved in the provision of road cargo transport services; trademark licensing business; and operation of fresh bars chain. Kofola CeskoSlovensko a.s. is headquartered in Ostrava, the Czech Republic. Kofola CeskoSlovensko a.s. is a subsidiary of AETOS a.s.

AV2.F.summary: Avast Plc, together with its subsidiaries, provides digital security products under the Avast, HMA, AVG, and CCleaner brands worldwide. It operates through two segments, Consumer and Small to Mid-Sized Business (SMB). The company offers desktop security and mobile device protection products; value-added solutions for performance, privacy, and other tools; dynamic secure search solution, including browser toolbar; and big data and marketing analytics solutions, as well as security and protection solutions for small and medium-sized business. It also provides standalone and managed antivirus products; and managed security platforms, including CloudCare, an online security service for small and medium businesses, as well as Management Console, a cloud-based console that deploys antivirus protection to multiple devices and manage all devices from one place. In addition, the company offers business security services, such as patch management, backup and recovery, email security, content filtering, and secure Web and Internet gateway services. The company primarily sells software licenses through e-commerce services providers, and retailers and resellers. Avast Plc was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Prague, the Czech Republic.

CEZ.F.summary: CEZ, a. s., an electricity generation company, engages in the production, distribution, trade, and sale of electricity and heat in Western, Central, and Southeastern Europe. The company operates through six segments: Generation-Traditional Energy, Generation-New Energy, Distribution, Sales, Mining, and Support Services. It operates eleven fossil fuel plants, sixteen hydroelectric plants, one combined cycle gas turbine plant, and two nuclear plants in the Czech Republic. The company, through its subsidiaries, also operates various fossil fuel, hydro, wind, solar, biogas, and biomass power plants in the Czech Republic; eleven wind power plants in Germany; two fossil fuel plants and one hydroelectric plant in Poland; one solar plant in Bulgaria; and a wind farm and a complex of hydroelectric plants in Romania. The company also engages in the distribution of electricity; trade and sale of natural gas; and mining of coal. In addition, it is involved in quarrying and processing of construction aggregate and high-percentage limestones; and commodity trading in wholesale markets. Further, the company engages in the planning, construction, and maintenance of energy facilities. CEZ, a. s. was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Prague, the Czech Republic.

CZG.PR.summary: CZG - CeskÃ¡ zbrojovka Group SE, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the production, purchase, and sale of firearms and tactical accessories in Czech Republic, the United States, Europe, Africa, Asia, and internationally. It is also involved in the leasing of real estate; trading in military material; operation of shooting academy; and production of scope mounts. The company markets its products under the CeskÃ¡ zbrojovka, CZ-USA, Dan Wesson, Zbrojovka Brno, and 4M Systems brands. It sells its products for military and law enforcement, personal defense, hunting, sport shooting, and other civilian uses. The company was formerly known as EHC CZUB, SE and changed its name to CZG - CeskÃ¡ zbrojovka Group SE in June 2019. The company was founded in 1936 and is headquartered in Prague, Czech Republic. CZG - CeskÃ¡ zbrojovka Group SE is a subsidiary of Ceska Zbrojovka Partners SE.

EFORU.PR.summary: E4U a.s. invests in and operates plants that generate energy from renewable sources in the Czech Republic. It operates two solar parks, Dubnany and Ratiskovice power stations with a total installed capacity of 4.4 MWp in the area of southern Moravia. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Dubnany, the Czech Republic. E4U a.s. is a subsidiary of E4U Finance s.r.o.

EMAN.PR.summary: eMan s.r.o. develops applications for smartphones, tablets, websites, cars, and other smart devices in the Czech Republic, Europe, and North America. The company also offers various services, including websites and web applications, consulting services, integrated solutions, biometric and electronic signatures, mobile device management, and other services. It serves banking and finance, power engineering and utility, industry and transport, telecommunication and service, retail, nonprofit and public, and other sectors. The company was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Prague, the Czech Republic.

ENRGA.PR.summary: ENERGOAQUA, a.s. engages in the manufacture, distribution, and sale of energy media and services in the electricity, thermal energy, industrial gases, and water management in the Czech Republic. The company produces and distributes potable and industrial water; operates and manages sewage and storm sewers; and produces and distributes chilled water for cooling of technological equipment, chilled water for the purpose of air conditioning and refrigeration special circuits technologist equipment, and demineralized water. It also supplies thermal energy for heating and hot-water to the industrial zones and residential areas; and produces, treats, stores, and distributes compressed air, warehouse technology gas, hydrogen gas, liquid and gaseous nitrogen, and natural gas, as well as operates regulating stations, stores liquid, and distributes gaseous oxygen. In addition, the company is involved in operating and maintaining HVAC and industrial refrigeration equipment; measuring environmental cleanliness in air conditioned spaces, and microclimate environmental parameter; and auditing fire dampers of buildings, as well as provides metrology services for measuring devices, sensors, thermometers, pressure gauages, etc. Further, it operates and manages waste water treatment plants, chemical sewer system, and storage tanks and drains for treating wastewater disposal of chemical waste water produced in the industrial areas. Additionally, the company provides machinery and building maintenance works, such as metalworking, locksmith, plumbing, construction, painting, excavation, trucking freight and passenger, and car-repairing works; and installs, maintains, and services telecommunications and network equipment. It also rents and sells production entities; and constructs and develops residential and civic facilities. ENERGOAQUA, a.s. was founded in 1992 and is based in Roznov pod Radhostem, the Czech Republic.

KARIN.PR.summary: Karo Invest A.S. processes, produces, and sells industrial leather products in the Czech Republic and other European Union countries. It offers buffalo and cowhide products primarily for furniture manufacturers. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Prague, the Czech Republic.

KMERF.summary: KomercnÃ­ banka, a.s., together with its subsidiaries, provides various retail, corporate, and investment banking services primarily in the Czech Republic, and Central and Eastern Europe. The company accepts various deposits, such as current and savings accounts, term deposits, and foreign currency accounts. Its loan products include optimal, personal, student, and home equity/secured loans; loans for start-up businesses, business loans, business operating loans, and revolving loans; operational, installment, claims, and structured finance; and mortgage loans. The company also offers payment, debit, and credit cards; investment products; life, travel and card, and property insurance products; overdraft, trade and export, bond issuance, cash and payment, cash pooling, bills of exchange, financial instruments trading, leases, foreign currency and derivative, and guarantee transaction services, as well as Internet, telephone, and mobile banking services. It serves individuals, small businesses, corporates, and municipalities. As of December 31, 2019, the company operated 343 branches and 796 ATMs. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Prague, the Czech Republic. KomercnÃ­ banka, a.s. is a subsidiary of SociÃ©tÃ© GÃ©nÃ©rale S.A.

MM0.F.summary: MONETA Money Bank, a.s. provides banking and financial services to retail customers, small and medium size enterprises, corporate clients, and financial and public sector institutions in the Czech Republic. The company operates through Commercial Clients, Retail Clients, and Treasury/Other segments. It offers various deposit products, including current and savings accounts, term deposits, and transactional products. The company also provides secured lending products, such as mortgages and finance leases; unsecured lending products consisting of consumer and auto loans, credit cards, and personal overdrafts; and commercial lending products comprising working capital, investment loans, finance and operating leases, auto loans, inventory financing, financing of small businesses and entrepreneurs through guarantees, letters of credits, and foreign exchange transactions. In addition, it intermediates additional payment protection insurance, which covers the customer's monthly loan payment in the event of unemployment, accident, or sickness; and acts as the intermediary to provide its customers with other insurance and investment products. Further, the company engages in the foreign exchange transactions, interest rate swaps, investment in debt securities, equity investments, other nonÂinterest bearing assets, and other operations, as well as provision of debit and credit cards. As of December 31, 2019, it operated a network of 179 branches and 632 ATMs. The company was formerly known as GE Money Bank, a.s. and changed its name to MONETA Money Bank, a.s. in May 2016. MONETA Money Bank, a.s. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Prague, the Czech Republic.

MONETA Money Bank, a.s. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Prague, the Czech Republic.

PD5.F.summary: PFNonwovens a.s. produces and sells nonwoven textiles in Europe, the Middle East, and Africa. The company offers spunmelt polypropylene and polypropylene/polyethylene-based textiles primarily for use in disposable hygiene products, such as baby diapers, adult incontinency, and feminine hygiene products, as well as in construction, agricultural, and medical applications. It also produces medical protective clothes, such as surgical masks, surgical gowns and drapes, and head and shoe covers, as well as protective overalls and masks. In addition, the company provides nonwoven textiles for use in vegetable cultivation and gardening, as well as used as a covering textile for plants and sheltering them from weather changes and various pests; and used as a mulching fabric for preventing the growth and spreading of weeds. Further, it offers nonwoven fabrics for use as a neatening fabric and seam reinforcement in the production of mattresses or as disposable hygienic bed covers, as well as used as a component of composite material for the production of under-roofing covers, heat and sound insulation, and wind barriers in the construction industry. It sells its products under the Pegatex S, Pegatex S BICO, Pegatex SMS, Pegatex SMS BICO, Pegatex Micro, and PEGAS-AGRO names. The company was formerly known as PEGAS NONWOVENS a.s. and changed its name to PFNonwovens a.s. in June 2018. PFNonwovens a.s. was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Prague, the Czech Republic. PFNonwovens a.s. is a subsidiary of PFNonwovens Holding s.r.o.

The company was formerly known as PEGAS NONWOVENS a.s. and changed its name to PFNonwovens a.s. in June 2018. PFNonwovens a.s. was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Prague, the Czech Republic. PFNonwovens a.s. is a subsidiary of PFNonwovens Holding s.r.o.

PINK.PR.summary: Pilulka LÃ©kÃ¡rny a.s. operates a chain of pharmacies in the Czech Republic. It operates 140 pharmacies, as well as an e-shop. The company is headquartered in Liben, the Czech Republic.

PRIUA.PR.summary: Primoco UAV SE develops, produces, and sells unmanned aerial vehicles (UAV) and aircraft engines in Russia, the Middle East, Africa, Asia, and South America. It also offers air and training services. The company's products are used in agriculture; remote mapping; power line corridor mapping; military UAV training; civil engineering; law enforcement; surveillance and reconnaissance; airspace navaid systems calibration; electronic warfare; disaster relief; pipeline and energy lines monitoring; railway monitoring; target drone; and environmental protection and research, as well as in coastal surveillance, search and rescue, and border protection activities. Primoco UAV SE was founded in 2015 and is based in Prague, the Czech Republic.

PVT.PR.summary: RMS Mezzanine, a.s. provides capital to small-and medium-sized companies. The company offers mezzanine funding. It also invests in companies, such as energy, service, health care, telecommunications/media, retail, construction/real estate, and production enterprises. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Prague, the Czech Republic. RMS Mezzanine, a.s. is a subsidiary of Asseco Poland SpÃ³lka Akcyjna.

TABAK.PR.summary: Philip Morris CR a.s., together with its subsidiary Philip Morris Slovakia s.r.o., produces, sells, distributes, and markets tobacco products in the Czech Republic and the Slovak Republic. The company also distributes smoke-free tobacco products under the HEETS name; and IQOS, a tobacco heating systems and related accessories, as well as cigarettes. It provides its tobacco products primarily under the Marlboro, L&M, Philip Morris, Petra Klasik, Sparta, and Chesterfield brands. The company was formerly known as TabÃ¡k, a.s. and changed its name to Philip Morris CR a.s. in November 2000. The company was incorporated in 1991 and is headquartered in Prague, the Czech Republic. Philip Morris CR a.s. is asubsidiary of Philip Morris International Inc.

TOMA.PR.summary: TOMA, a.s. engages in the electricity, air, water, steam, and gas distribution businesses in the Czech Republic. It operates a wastewater treatment plant; produces drinking water; develops residential, commercial, and industrial buildings; and offers sewer cleaning, financial leasing, and hydro analytical laboratory services. The company also sells non-residential building and land projects; and rents apartments, commercial and non-residential buildings, and land projects. In addition, it offers railway siding services; disposes hazardous liquid waste; and manages roads in the industrial area. The company is based in Otrokovice, the Czech Republic.
